Detailed Description

The collection of information about a user returned by a Whois query. Instances of this class are created internally.

Member Function Documentation

string [] Alaris.Irc.WhoisInfo.GetChannels (  ) 

An array of channel names. Names may have =,@, or + prefixed to them.

Returns:
A string array.

User's idle time in seconds.

Seconds as a long.

bool Alaris.Irc.WhoisInfo.Operator [get]

Whether the user is an operator or not.

True if the user is an IRC operator.

A user's real name.

A string

string Alaris.Irc.WhoisInfo.Server [get]

The name of IRC server.

The IRC server FQDN hostname string.

string Alaris.Irc.WhoisInfo.ServerDescription [get]

Text describing the IRC server.

A string describing the IRC network this server is a member of.

A user's nick, logon, and hostname.

A UserInfo instance.
